widgets_values:
These nodes can save audio in different formats. Currently, all the modes are Bypass. You can enable them as per your needs.

这些节点可以将 audio  保存成不同格式，目前的模式都是 Bypass ，你可以按你的需要来启用

nodes.title: About ACE Step and Multi-language Input
widgets_values:
## comfyui-wiki.com

[ACE Step v1 教程](https://comfyui-wiki.com/en/tutorial/advanced/audio/ace-step/ace-step-v1)  ｜
[Tutoriel ACE Step v1](https://comfyui-wiki.com/fr/tutorial/advanced/audio/ace-step/ace-step-v1)  ｜
[ACE 단계 v1 튜토리얼](https://comfyui-wiki.com/ko/tutorial/advanced/audio/ace-step/ace-step-v1)  ｜
[ACE Step v1 チュートリアル](https://comfyui-wiki.com/ja/tutorial/advanced/audio/ace-step/ace-step-v1)  ｜
[Tutorial de ACE Step v1](https://comfyui-wiki.com/es/tutorial/advanced/audio/ace-step/ace-step-v1)  


## docs.comfy.org

[Tutorial](http://docs.comfy.org/tutorials/audio/ace-step/ace-step-v1) | [教程](http://docs.comfy.org/zh-CN/tutorials/audio/ace-step/ace-step-v1)


### Model Download

Download the following model and save it to the **ComfyUI/models/checkpoints** folder.
[ace_step_v1_3.5b.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/ACE-Step_ComfyUI_repackaged/blob/main/all_in_one/ace_step_v1_3.5b.safetensors)

LoRA: [ACE-Step Chinese Rap LoRA](https://huggingface.co/ACE-Step/ACE-Step-v1-chinese-rap-LoRA/blob/main/pytorch_lora_weights.safetensors) 

rename it to "ACE-Step-v1-chinese-rap.safetensors" and save it in the "ComfyUI/models/loras" folder. 

### Multilingual Support

Currently, the implementation of multi-language support for ACE-Step V1 is achieved by uniformly converting different languages into English characters. At present, in ComfyUI, we haven't implemented the step of converting multi-languages into English. This is because if we need to implement the corresponding conversion, we have to add additional core dependencies of ComfyUI, which may lead to uncertain dependency conflicts.

So, currently, if you need to input multi-language text, you have to manually convert it into English characters to complete this process. Then, at the beginning of the corresponding `lyrics`, input the abbreviation of the corresponding language code.

For example, for Chinese, use `[zh]`, for Japanese use `[ja]`, for Korean use `[ko]`, and so on. For specific language input, please check the examples in the instructions. 

For example, Chinese `[zh]`, Japanese `[ja]`, Korean `[ko]`, etc.

Example:

```
[verse]

[zh]wo3zou3guo4shen1ye4de5jie1dao4
[zh]leng3feng1chui1luan4si1nian4de5piao4liang4wai4tao4
[zh]ni3de5wei1xiao4xiang4xing1guang1hen3xuan4yao4
[zh]zhao4liang4le5wo3gu1du2de5mei3fen1mei3miao3

[chorus]

[verse]​
[ko]hamkke si-kkeuleo-un sesang-ui sodong-eul pihae​
[ko]honja ogsang-eseo dalbich-ui eolyeompus-ileul balaboda​
[ko]niga salang-eun lideum-i ganghan eum-ag gatdago malhaess-eo​
[ko]han ta han tamada ma-eum-ui ondoga eolmana heojeonhanji ijge hae

[bridge]
[es]cantar mi anhelo por ti sin ocultar
[es]como poesía y pintura, lleno de anhelo indescifrable
[es]tu sombra es tan terca como el viento, inborrable
[es]persiguiéndote en vuelo, brilla como cruzar una mar de nubes

[chorus]
[fr]que tu sois le vent qui souffle sur ma main
[fr]un contact chaud comme la douce pluie printanière
[fr]que tu sois le vent qui s'entoure de mon corps
[fr]un amour profond qui ne s'éloignera jamais

```

---

### 模型下载

下载下面的模型并保存到 **ComfyUI/models/checkpoints** 文件夹下
[ace_step_v1_3.5b.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/ACE-Step_ComfyUI_repackaged/blob/main/all_in_one/ace_step_v1_3.5b.safetensors)

LoRA: [ACE-Step Chinese Rap LoRA](https://huggingface.co/ACE-Step/ACE-Step-v1-chinese-rap-LoRA/blob/main/pytorch_lora_weights.safetensors) 重命名为： ACE-Step-v1-chinese-rap.safetensors 保存到 ComfyUI/models/loras 文件夹下


### 多语言支持

目前 ACE-Step V1 多语言的实现是通过将不同语言统一转换为英文字符来实现的，目前在 ComfyUI 中我们并没有实现多语言转换为英文的这一步骤。因为如果需要实现对应转换，则需要增加额外的 ComfyUI 核心依赖，这将可能带来不确定的依赖冲突。

所以目前如果你需要输入多语言，则需要手动转换为英文字符来实现这一过程，然后在对应 `lyrics` 开头输入对应语言代码的缩写。

比如中文`[zh]` 日语 `[ja]` 韩语 `[ko]` 等，具体语言输入请查看说明中的示例

nodes.title: About ACE Step and Multi-language Input
widgets_values:
For this node, you need to install [ComfyUI_ACE-Step](https://github.com/billwuhao/ComfyUI_ACE-Step). Currently, for en, es, fr, ko, and zh, you can directly input the content during testing. For Japanese, please delete this part and directly input using katakana. Alternatively, you can access and use the original workflow of [ComfyUI_ACE-Step](https://github.com/billwuhao/ComfyUI_ACE-Step).  

---

这个节点你需要安装 [ComfyUI_ACE-Step](https://github.com/billwuhao/ComfyUI_ACE-Step) 目前对 en、es、fr、ko、zh 测试下都可以直接输入，日文请删除这个部分，直接使用片假名输入，或者访问使用 [ComfyUI_ACE-Step](https://github.com/billwuhao/ComfyUI_ACE-Step)  原始的工作流

nodes.title: Note
widgets_values: PS：示例歌词来自 ACE-Step 原始项目页面，中文区的小伙伴，这个并不是我的心声

High-energy male rap, aggressive and fast-paced, inspired by Eminem. Clear articulation, punchy delivery, intense rhythm Lo-Fi Hip Hop beat, 100-120 BPM, strong bass, drum kicks, Vocal timbre: bright and warm, expressive, slightly gritty for rap effect

[Intro]
Yo, check the green scene, let’s break it down in a flash,
Rubisco’s the boss, fixing CO₂ in a splash,
Carbon‑fixing enzyme, the plant’s MVP,
Turns air to sugar, the ultimate recipe.

[Verse]
Photosynthesis, the light‑driven flow,
H₂O split, O₂ on the go,
Sun’s photons hit chlorophyll’s hue,
Excite the electrons, make the energy crew.

[Verse]
Chlorophyll’s the pigment, a solar‑catching king,
Absorbing red‑blue, let the green light sing,
From thylakoid stacks to the Calvin ring,
Plants turn light to life—nature’s rap king!
